channel.title: apple on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in apple on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Here’s everything Apple could announce at its March 8 ‘Peek performance’ special event (5 minute read) Apple will hold its ‘Peek Performance’ virtual event on March 8.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-22
item.description: Apple Reportedly Completes Production Tests for AR/VR Headset (1 minute read) Apple has completed key production tests for its long-rumored augmented and virtual reality headset.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-10
item.description: Apple’s “realityOS” surfaces in GitHub commits, App Store logs (2 minute read) Software developers have discovered references to a new Apple operating system, realityOS, in App Store upload logs and GitHub repositories.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-08
item.description: Apple Acquires AI Music Startup That Can Generate Dynamic Soundtracks (2 minute read) Apple has acquired AI Music, a startup that uses artificial intelligence to generate personalized soundtracks and adaptive music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-12
item.description: Locket, an app for sharing photos to friends’ homescreens, hits the top of the App Store (5 minute read) Locket is an app that turns Apple’s widget system into a private social networking platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-05
item.description: Intel teases new technology to improve iPhone and Apple Watch integration with PCs (2 minute read) Intel’s next-generation Evo PCs may have iPhone and Apple Watch integration with iMessage support.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-03
item.description: Apple developing new external display that’s around half the price of the Pro Display XDR (2 minute read) Apple may be preparing to launch a new external display this year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-29
item.description: Apple offering engineers $180,000 bonuses to prevent poaching (2 minute read) The employee poaching war between Apple and Meta is heating up, with Apple now offering top engineering talents stock bonuses worth up to $180,000 to prevent them from defecting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-17
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to make its own wireless chips for the iPhone (2 minute read) Apple is opening an office in southern California and hiring engineers to work on wireless radios, radio-frequency integrated circuits, and a wireless SoC.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-08
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook engineered a secret $275 billion deal with China (3 minute read) A recently published report details Apple CEO Tim Cook’s efforts to establish strong relationships between Apple and the Chinese government.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-11
item.description: Apple launches Apple Business Essentials: Device management, storage, onsite repairs, and more for one monthly price (2 minute read) Apple Business Essentials is a new offering from Apple that combines device management, 24/7 phone support for IT and end-users, business iCloud support, and an option for onsite repairs for some businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-19
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced: New AirPods, MacBook Pros, colorful HomePod Minis and more (8 minute read) Apple has announced new MacBook Pro laptops with M1 Pro and M1 Max chips, an HDMI port, an SD card slot, a MagSafe connector, a notch cutout on the top of the screen, and 3 USB-C ports.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-13
item.description: ‘Unleashed’ Apple Event Focusing on New Macs to Take Place on October 18 (2 minute read) Apple will be holding its Unleashed event on October 18 at 10 am Pacific Time at the Steve Jobs Theater on the Apple Park campus in Cupertino.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-15
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at its iPhone 13 event (3 minute read) Apple has unveiled its latest line of hardware releases at its California Streaming event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-13
item.description: Jim Lanzone breaks up with Tinder, swipes right to take the CEO job at Yahoo, Renate Nyborg takes Tinder CEO role (3 minute read) Jim Lanzone, the current CEO of Tinder, has been appointed the new CEO for Yahoo under Apollo Global.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-08
item.description: Apple Event Announced: ‘California Streaming’ on September 14 With iPhone 13, Apple Watch Series 7 Expected (3 minute read) Apple’s next event will be on September 14 at 10 am.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-01
item.description: South Korea law forces Google and Apple to open up app store payments (3 minute read) Apple and Google are battling lawsuits and regulators around the world due to their app store rules.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-30
item.description: Amazon partners with Affirm to roll out first buy now, pay later option on the e-commerce site (2 minute read) Amazon has partnered with Affirm to offer installment payment options.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-21
item.description: Square launches business bank accounts (3 minute read) Square Banking is a new product from Square that features a checking account, savings accounts, debit cards, and loans.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-14
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Pay Later’ service to let customers buy any Apple Pay purchases in monthly installments (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new service called Apple Pay Later that will allow users to buy products and pay them off in monthly installments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-15
item.description: Apple Watch model for extreme sports reportedly in development (1 minute read) This year’s Apple Watch, likely called the Apple Watch Series 7, will have a faster processor, an updated screen, and ultra-wideband functionality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-09
item.description: Apple in talks with Chinese battery makers for Apple Car (2 minute read) Apple is allegedly talking to two major Chinese battery makers about supplying batteries for its electric vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-08
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at the WWDC 2021 keynote (6 minute read) Apple’s Worldwide Developer Conference was full of announcements with all the new things coming to its various devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-04
item.description: Waymo’s driverless taxi service can now be accessed on Google Maps (2 minute read) Waymo One can now be accessed and booked through Google Maps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-07
item.description: Virgin Hyperloop Shows off the Future: Mass Transport in Floating Magnetic Pods (3 minute read) Virgin Hyperloop is developing its technology at a site in the desert just north of Las Vegas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-05
item.description: Walmart’s unannounced cloud gaming service detailed in confidential Epic emails (3 minute read) Project Storm is Walmart’s attempt at a cloud gaming service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-03
item.description: Apple Watch Could Gain Breakthrough Health Upgrade (2 minute read) Rockley Photonics produces sensors for the Apple Watch.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-21
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at its ‘Spring Loaded’ event today (3 minute read) Here’s everything Apple announced at its ‘Spring Loaded’ event today (3 minute read)

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-13
item.description: Apple reportedly developing an Apple TV with a built-in camera and speaker (2 minute read) Apple is developing a new TV accessory that combines the Apple TV with a HomePod speaker and camera for video calls.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-09
item.description: SpaceX moves to beam Starlink internet into cars, boats, and aircraft (3 minute read) SpaceX is seeking regulatory approval to connect its Starlink network to cars, trucks, shipping boats, and aircraft.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-19
item.description: Apple Hiring Engineers to Develop 6G Wireless (3 minute read) Apple recently posted job ads looking for wireless system research engineers for current and next-generation networks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-12
item.description: First Apple TV+ AR app launches with ‘For All Mankind’ backstory through mixed reality (3 minute read) First Apple TV+ AR app launches with ‘For All Mankind’ backstory through mixed reality (3 minute read)

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-01
item.description: Apple just paid a record $25 million to buy a Sundance movie (2 minute read) Apple paid roughly $25 million for a movie at the Sundance Film Festival, the largest deal ever at the event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-29
item.description: Robinhood, Interactive Brokers restrict trading in GameStop stock and options (7 minute read) Robinhood took steps to restrict the trading in GameStop stock and other related securities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-30
item.description: Apple Watch leak offers rare glimpse inside ‘Ultra security program’ (2 minute read) A video purporting to show an Apple Watch prototype has leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-23
item.description: Elon Musk says Apple refused a meeting to acquire Tesla (2 minute read) Elon Musk attempted to sell Tesla to Apple during the Model 3 rollout in 2017.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-22
item.description: Exclusive: Apple targets car production by 2024 and eyes ‘next level’ battery technology (5 minute read) Apple’s Project Titan is moving forward with its self-driving car technology.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-19
item.description: Apple will reduce App Store cut to 15 percent for most developers starting January 1st (5 minute read) Apple will reduce its App Store commission rate to 15 percent for developers who earn less than $1 million in annual sales per year from all of their apps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-11
item.description: The 5 biggest announcements from Apple’s ‘One More Thing’ hardware event (4 minute read) Apple announced new versions of the MacBook Air, the 13-inch MacBook Pro, and the Mac mini at its ‘One More Thing’ live stream.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-03
item.description: Apple announces November 10 One More Thing event for ARM-based Macs (3 minute read) Apple has announced a third fall media event as expected.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-29
item.description: Apple search engine efforts ‘stepping up’ as Google deal under threat (4 minute read) Apple has been working on its Applebot crawler since before 2015, and with Google under investigation for antitrust practices, it may have to put it to use.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-20
item.description: ‘Apple Music TV’ Launches in U.S. (1 minute read) Apple has just launched Apple Music TV, a 24-hour stream of music videos, live shows, and events.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-14
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced at its iPhone 12 event (10 minute read) Apple has announced the new range of iPhones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-12
item.description: iPhone 12 lineup’s pricing and release dates detailed in new leak (3 minute read) Details about what Apple could announce at its October 13th event have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-29
item.description: Apple vs. Epic hearing previews a long, hard-fought trial to come (3 minute read) Epic’s request for a temporary injunction in its case against Apple was heard recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-16
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced (9 minute read) Apple has announced a new virtual fitness service, a subscription service called Apple One, and a new lineup of Apple Watches and iPads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-14
item.description: What to expect from Apple’s ‘Time Flies’ event: Apple Watch Series 6, a redesigned iPad Air, and more (4 minute read) Apple’s ‘Time Flies’ event will be on September 15.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-27
item.description: Elon Musk promises demo of a working Neuralink device on Friday (2 minute read) Neuralink will demonstrate a working device on August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-25
item.description: Apple reportedly acquires VR startup ‘Spaces’ (1 minute read) Spaces is a startup with a team that specializes in virtual reality technologies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-20
item.description: Palantir to relocate headquarters from Silicon Valley to Colorado (2 minute read) Palantir Technologies is relocating its headquarters to Denver, Colorado from Palo Alto, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-29
item.description: Apple threatens to remove Airbnb from App Store over virtual experiences commission (2 minute read) Apple has demanded a 30% commission for sales of online classes sold by Airbnb and ClassPass.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-27
item.description: Galaxy Watch 3 app reveals new gestures for calls, taking photos (2 minute read) The Samsung Galaxy Watch 3 app has arrived at the Play Store.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-22
item.description: LinkedIn cuts 960 jobs as pandemic puts the brakes on corporate hiring (1 minute read) LinkedIn reported on Tuesday that it would cut about 960 jobs due to the sustained impact that the coronavirus pandemic is having on the demand for its recruitment products.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-06-30
item.description: Uber reportedly looking to buy Postmates delivery service (1 minute read) Uber has made an offer to purchase Postmates.
